description:
Cocoa`s sister Mocha is coming to visit! Or she should be, but the wait drags on. Cocoa sets out into town to find her, but with no luck. Mocha, meanwhile, is in the park cuddling a feral rabbit. Will the two sisters find each other?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitokuchi de Futsuu no Mochimochi Da to Minuita yo
I Could Tell with One Bite That It`s Just a Normal Chewy
ひと口で普通のもちもちだと見抜いたよ
